navigate_website.name: navigate_website
navigate_website.description: Open the browser and type in the flight booking website URL.

search_flights.name: search_flights
search_flights.description: Observe the website to identify the input fields for departure, destination, and dates, then enter the respective details.

select_flight.name: select_flight
select_flight.description: Observe the search results and select a flight based on predefined criteria.

enter_passenger_details.name: enter_passenger_details
enter_passenger_details.description: Fill in the passenger details form with personal information.

complete_payment.name: complete_payment
complete_payment.description: Enter payment information and complete the booking process.
